scripts.postbump: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); pkg.optionalDependencies['dsql_dump-linux-x64-gnu'] = pkg.version; pkg.optionalDependencies['dsql_dump-linux-arm64-gnu'] = pkg.version; pkg.optionalDependencies['dsql_dump-darwin-arm64'] = pkg.version; pkg.optionalDependencies['dsql_dump-darwin-x64'] = pkg.version; pkg.optionalDependencies['dsql_dump-win32-x64'] = pkg.version; pkg.optionalDependencies['dsql_dump-win32-arm64'] = pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg, null, 2) + '\n');"
